Summary: lights moving in 90 degree angles around the moon during eclipse
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Asheville
There were no other sightings in Asheville on or around August 28th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsCould see lights in various locations around moon, they would move at incredible speed left to right up and down. stopping at times then zooming up at unbelievable speed to about over head.approx. distance was about two spans in about 5 seconds. I was mesmerized and thinking how lucky I am to be seeing this. If anyone else saw this they would surely believe there is something out there. I looked in diff. parts of the sky during this event and saw nothing moving in order to confirm to me what I saw. "WOW", a once in a life time sighting. Has anyone else contacted you about this? I am not an idiot what so ever, what I saw ways real.There is no doubt in my mind I could possibly be wrong.I thought maybe there were some sat. placed to photo the eclipse until they started moving at right angles and stopping then moving again sometimes in diff. directions. I lost sight of the event when a fog bank started to move in the area.
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
